div.p:
the thryde day of Januar the yer of gode JM iiijC lxxxvij yeris thir personis
vndir writin that is to say Williame Kintor Mastir Androw cadiow Jhone Knollis
thomas fif ser Jhone ruthirfurd aldirman Dauid symsone Robert prat Richerd
hile the fadir Jhone Wormet Androw andirsone Wile cryne Jhone Moir
Richerd of Cullane alexander Nachty Jhone of glenmaluyn Will moire eldar
Will gareache eldar Duncan smitht Syme gardin thome louson Wat
auchnef James Colisone Mavnis Wormet Dauid prat Alexander sancher Ri
cherd hile henry hourvm alexander angosone Jhone fechat eldar Androw simson
Edmond hay alexander gareache William gareache yongar Robert buchan Jhon'
cathnes Jhone grige Wat thomsone James andirsone Wil Dunbrek
Will balheluy Ranald talyour Wil moir' yongar thome chamer litstar
thome sadillar' Dauid michelsone alexander Ranison' James smitht Wil rani
sone thomas meldrum Androw michelsone Jhon' fechat yongar Dauid galithly
Dauid gichtan thome gledstane Will andirsone eldar Robert ouchterles'
Will philp Wil nory Jhone blak Jhone thomsone Wil andirsone yongar
James crage Jhone tuliboy henry tulidef patrik andirsone Wile Hay
Wile quelp Dauid spens alexander talyour cristy prat thome of narne
Jhone Waus gilbertis sone thome chapman Androw murray yongar alexander
rolland thome yuire Wil verte Robert talyour gilbert gareache'
Dauid beuerlay alexander mernoche Jhone brogane Wil brabnar' nichol
loremar' Jhone litstar in the grene Jhone Durvarde Jhone blak in the
Castalgate James Kennarty Androw smitht alexander Wilsone Dauid egoy
Jhone ros' Wile fywe alexander chamer of the schipraw gilbert moresone and
Dauid Mar' circualy Inquerit be thar avne namys be William
blinsell balye grantit and consentit to reformacione distruction and annul
lacione' of the last generale assedacione maid vndir the common' sele be
alexander menyes aldirman of the towne for the tyme and certane vthiris commissaris
with him of the watteris and malis landis of the towne And thai mad ser
Jhone ruthirfurd aldirman Jhone Knollis mastir Androw cadiow thome fif and Jhone Wormet
procuratoris to follow the saide commissaris

Curia Capitalis Burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem per balliuos septimo die Januarij Anno Domini Mil
lesimo quadringentesimo Octuagesimo Septimo quo die sectis
vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo secte

the saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to alexander chamer
to ansuer to ane borghe strekit apone him be Dauid galichtly for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane yonge oxe

the samyn day alexander sanchar and thome simsone was suorne the gret aitht
to stande at the ordinance and deliuerance of thomas fif mastir Androw cadiow thomas
prat and William Kintor amicabile compositoris chosin betuix thaim anent ale debatis concerning
tham quhilkis was suorne the gret aitht to giffurtht thar' deliuerance tharapon' one
the morne hereftir or the sone gaing to

the samyn day it was fundin be ane suorne assise Alexander rede forspekar that Williame
of gareache yongar is quyt of William abirdouris challance of samekile of flan
dris money as Richerd of cullan resauit fra his factouris In the behalf of William
abirdour becaus' the saide Richerde hade ane sufficient procuratory of him to the resat
of the samyn

the quhilk day Richerd of Cullane drew his landis and gudis to the ballieis to
pay samekile of flandris money within terme of law as he resauit in flandris
in the name of William abirdour fra William gareache yongar and his factouris

the quhilk day the ballieis assignit this day monetht to thome chamer
litstar to ansuer as day of peremptour to Jho James steile for the wrang
uis' withhaldin fra him of iiij elne and iij quartaris of quhit clath gevin to lytt

Eodem die Willelmus Kyntor protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu xl d' sibi debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum inter terram ipsius Willelmi ex orien
tali ex vna et terram Johannis talyour ex boriali et communem viam regiam ex occidentali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
in sacculo ballivis presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Willelmo
gray Willelmo verty et thoma Jamesone seriando

EodemThis entry is scored through diagonally in pencil. die dominus Johannes Stirueling' capellanus ac procurator capelle
beate Katerine accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex
solidorum et octo d' sibi debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico Nauium inter
terram henrici Forbes ex boreali et terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in
sacculo ballivis presentauit in curiam tanquam primo die huius processus testibus
Waltero mernys alexandro huchonsone et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die dominus Alexander vocat collector ac procurator Collegii Abirdonensis
accedens ad barram et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu x s' sibi
procuratorio nomine quo supra debit' de quadam terra Jacente in vico Nauium inter terram
henrici forbes ex boriali et terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex occidentali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus
Willelmo gray scissore Willelmo gray mercatore et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die Religiosus vir frater petrus stirueling' minister domus sancte trinitatis
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu xxxto d' dicte domui et sibi debit' de
quodam orto vasto Jacente propo prope locum dicte domus ex parte orientali cimi
terij eiusdem et torrentem Sancte trinitatis ex australi ad quam accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis
presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus alexandro rollande
Johanne sclugy et Roberto Club sergiando

Eodem die magister alexander fif capellanus ac procurator altaris beate marie
virginis accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu quinque
solidorum sibi debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi prope
Denburne inter terram alexander logy ex occidentali et Denburne ex orientali
et nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis
presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus alexandro rolland
et Johannes sclugy et Robert club seriando

Eodem die dominus matheus nicholsone capellanus ac procurator altaris
beati petri apostolorum principis accedens ad barram et protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo redditu xx s' eidem altari et capellano eiusdem annuatim
debito de quadam terra Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Walteri pyot ex australi et terram quondam
thome croudane ex boriali ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in Curia tanquam
quarto die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Dunbrek thoma gledstane et
Roberto Club seriando

the samyne day the ballieis continevit the dome of this said lande proce
ssit be ser mathow quhil this day monetht to the cumin of the aldirman

Eodem die Dauid murray accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo redditu ij s' sibi debit' de quadam terra Jacente prope Denburne
inter terram martinj kemp ex orientali et crostum fratrum carmelitarum
ex occidentali et australi partibus ad quandam accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis in Curia presentauit tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Jacobo andirsone Willelmo ray et Roberto club seriando

Eodem die Willelmus futhes accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
sex s' sibi debit' de quadam terra Jacente in vico Nauium inter terram henrici forbes
ex boriali et terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex occidentali ad quam accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus testibus Johanne sclater Willelmo gareache et Roberto club seriando

Eodem die alexander mathosone accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
septem solidorum sibi debit' de quadam terra Jacente in vico furcarum extra portam inter
terram Johannis colisone ex australi et boriali partibus ad quam accedens Nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentauit in curia tanquam primo
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Dunbrek thoma gledstane et Roberto club seriando

the samyn day Androw lammyngtone offerit him reddy as he saide to pay the
annuel that is runnyne apone the lande processsit be the minister of the triniteis

the samyn day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to thome of mar' to ansuer
til a borche strekit apone him be thome quhit for the wranguisly arresting' of ane
pipe of wade and takin of it out of the Willekinnis schipe liand in the feir and for the
wranguisly taking' apone of it of xxiiij s' g' and the arresting' and housing' of it ex
tendis to viii s' g'

Jhone fechat sal haue xxv li g' and tharof salbe pait alsmekile as Jhone fechat is avand her'
to rede his dettis for lti s' the punde g' and alsmekile as he mistaris for his quhil the schipis saile sal be
deliuerit salbe deluierit him of the samyn price And the remanis salbe pait in brugis in flandris within viij
dais eftir that ony schip be lost that pass' out of Abirdene And gif Jhone fechat wantis his pament
atour the day he sal haue vi nobilis for the li' g' in abirdene within xl dais eftir that Jhon' fechat
bringis certification at he askit his pament in brugis and coud nocht gett it And' atour Jhon' fechat'
sal haue a doublat of fustiane with al stuf pertening tharto a bonat the price viii s' a hat and ane tup
pat that Symon gardin weris now and lying to his gone' that was in the hous' a curche to his wif the pric viii s'
Item a coyt to his sone lynit Item a stane of lynt to his wif Item he sal haue the butht that he duelt' in now for
iij yeris or ellis Ilke yer' j merke And als' ane quartar of the yard at symone gardynis will And quhen it
ples' Jhone fechat cum to symon gardinis' hous' he sal haue his met paid his quart of aile or les' or mar' as the lethe
is and salbe welcumar' than ane vthir man And' this condicion being' fulfillit and maid sikir Jhone fechat sal gif him herto
vile stat and possessione to h Symon gardin of his land in the castalgate thar condicionis' and appuntment to be maid in the
best and mast autentywe forme and can be diuisit In witnes quharof we haue subscrivit this writ with our hande at
abirdene the secunde day of Januar' the yer' of god jM iiijC auchty vij yeris / Androw cadiow manu propria
Robert blinseil manu propria
Jhon' wormet manu propria
I Androw murray et cetera

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiijo die Januarij anno ut supra
per balliuos

the quhilk day comperit Syme of gardin and producit ande
schew ane decret betuix him and Jhone fechat anent the bying' and selling' of
ane lande lyande in the castalgate Ande thar schew his obligacione of xxv
lib' gretis selit with his avne seile maide to the saide Jhone eftir the tenor of
the saide decret Ande offerit him reddy to fulfill ale thingis contenit in
the saide decret and to do al that he awe to do to the saide Jhone And' becaus'
the saide Jhone absentit him and wald nocht comper he besocht the ballieis that
nane of thame suld gif sesin of the saide lande to nane vthir persone sene
it is sauld' to him

The samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Androu murray eldar
forspekar that Jhone tailyour sal pay to Dauid hill ane barrele of
Salmond' be the next mydsummir or ellis samekile siluer as it ge
vis thame

the samyn day Dauid hill set his half nethis fischingis of Done that he
has of the bischop to Jhone brogane his gude sone for tua yeris
eftir this next fischinge for viij barrellis of Salmond yerlie
thre girls' in Ilkane hede to be pait be the sade Jhone

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvjo die Januarij anno ut
supra

Quo die compertum est per Inquisicionem quod Johannes malisone est filius
et heres propinquior quondam Willelmi Malisone patris sui

the samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid mar forspekar
that murthow glenmaluyne sal pay to alexander scrogis xi s' and vi d'
for ane hors' hir

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xxi die
Januarij anno quo supra

the samyn day the four' balyeis grantit ande assignit to the haly blude
licht al unlauys that cane be gottyne of al faltis done bigan
sene michaelmes' day to this day

the quhilk day the ballieis with consent of the haile court has assignit continevit
the actione' debatabile betuix mastir Richerd crafurde and Anny byrne quhile
this day xv dais anent the Junctfeftment clamit be the said agnes

The samyn day the saide Agnes with Jhone steuinsone and gilbert moreson hir forspekaris
for hir protestit solempnitly that the continuacione forsaide suld turne hir to nay
preiudice anent hir coniunctfefment and thai taxt Ilkane oulk v s' of maile
that the saide mastir Richerde occupeis and has Inhabit the landis that scho is in
coniunctfefment of

the quhilk day mastir Richerd crafurd protestit for v s' Ilkan oulk for his costis
and skathtis for the vexacione and Inquietacione done to him be the said Agnes

the samyn day Williame aberdour comperit befor the balyeis and askit thame pament
of the x li' g' aucht to him ande grantit be Richerde of Cullane in Jugement

the quhilk day the balyeis askit the saide Richerd of cullanis' gudis to be schavyn
to thame and thai suld pas' and mak penny of it to the pament of the x li' g'
aucht to William abirdouris And' gif thai coud gett na gudis thai suld deman
his lande as law will

Eodem die thomas mar super quem thomas quhit extendit plegium pro iniusta arre
stacione vnius pipj'j' overwrites 'e'. vadii capti de Naui Willekyne ac receptione super Idem
xxiiij s' g' and viij s' s' de expensis inde factis primo die vocatus ad respondendum non
comparuit quare precipitur thome Jameson seriando capere districtum a dicto thoma mar' et premunire eundem
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Eodem die Duncanus smitht super quem thomas quhit extendit plegium pro iniusta
detencione decim s' g' primo die vocatus non comparuit Igitur precipitur moricio bissat
seriando capere districtum ab eodem Duncano et premunire eum ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

The samyn day James of Kintor grantit him to pay to Dauid galichtly
samekile lyme as Dauid Kintor his brother and Jhon' sclater wald depone
be thar vndirstandyn' that he was avand' him

Eodem die alexander chamer super quem Dauid galichtly porrexit ple
gium pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius bouis Junioris primo
die vocatus non comparuit Ideo precipitur thome Jamesone seriando
capere districtum a dicto alexandro et premunire eum ad proximam cu
riam legalem tanquam tercium secundum diem processus

In the balye court of abirdene haldin be the balyeis in the tolbutht the
xxii day of Januar' the yer forsaide It was deliuerit be ane assis'
Williame of gareache eldar forspekar that gif Jhone' Waus cane
mak gude with Duncan straloche officiar that the half barrele of saipe
follouit be Jhone' lilburne was arrestit in Wile of Dunbrekis hous' the
saide Will of Dunbreke sal pay to Jhon' lilburne xiiij s'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per ballious eiusdem xxiij die Januarij anno
quo supra

the samyn day it was maide gude be Duncan straloche seriande that he arre
stit the demi barrele of saipe follouit be Jhone lilburne in the handis of Will
of Dunbreke

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxviijo die Januarij
anno quosupra

The quhilk day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid Mar' forspekar'
that Williame younge sal pay to hannekyne jc keling' merchande
gude betuix this and the saling' of thar schipis Ande falyeing tharof he sal ples'
him in vthir merchandice be sicht of tua evinly merchandmen

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem quarto die februarij
Anno Domini et cetera octagesimo Septimo

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman balyeis and the
haile court that Anny byrne the relict' of vmquhile adam of
crafurde sal reman with hir possessione of the tua landis of the said
vmquhile adamis liande within the said burghe quhile scho be lauchfully
put tharfra scho vphalding' the samyn eftir the tenor of hir Instrument
vndir the Seile of Dauid menyeis thar producit and schevin and thai ordanit ane
balye to pas' and rede the said' landis till hire

The said day comperit mastir Androu cadiow befor the sadis aldirman and balyeis
sittand' in Jugement in playne courte and follouit Robert blinsele Alexander Rede
thomas prat Androw murray eldar Androw Wyntone Ranalde talyour Dauid simsone
Jonhe' grige Williame filbe Walter thomsone the vidow of Jonhe' gregory and the vidow
of Androw atkin' for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of the Some of Sexscore
Pundis gretis flandris money to gude estimacion for the perseuyt and fallouing of there
gudis and merchandice in the court of burgunye quhilkis personis askit ane lachfull' day
to ansuer tharto And' the saidis aldirman and balyeis riplie with the hale court avisit with
Consent of batht the saide partiis assignit the xviij day of the said' monetht of februar
to the forsaid' merchandis and personis to ansuer perempturlie with the strintht of ane
borghe' to the saide mastir Androw for the wranguis' haldin' fra him of the saide some

Eodem die marioria stokar fecit et creauit Dauid mar suum procuratorem ad prosequendum Dauid michelson'
pro quinque li' et ix s' ad bonum compotum promittendum de Rato et grato et cetera

the samyn day it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and consall that gyf euer Symon gardin
spekis ony vicious' langage of ony of his nichtburis famous' personis in ony
place that may be defame to tham that beinge preuit apon him he sal gif tene
pundis to Sanct nicholas' werk vnforgevin to the quhilkis he oblist him be his
hande

the said day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhe' Colison forspekar that thome chamer
litstar sal pay to James steile and Jonhe' patersone the aval of Samekile clath as thai can
preyf thai deliuer tile him

Eodem die alexander chamer super quem Dauid galichtly porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione ab eo vnius'
bonis secundo die vocatus non comparuit Ideo precipitur thome Jameson' seriando ab eodem capere districtum
et premunire eum ad secundam Curiam proximam legalem tanquam tercio die huius processus

The samyn day thome Simsone be his hande drew his landis and gudis to the
balyes to freithe and kep tham skathtles of half ane last Salmond' clamyt
be thomas Wode eftir the tenor' of the kingis lettres direkit to tham tharapon'

The samyne day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to alexander sanchar
to ansuer tile ane borghe strekit apon' him be Androw goldsmitht for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of x s' and vj d'

the saide day the action' debatabile betuix thome of mar and thomas quhit
anent ane pip of wade is continevit be the aldirman and balyeis quhil to morne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio quinto die februarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman and balyeis chargit James leslie and Jhon' colison' to
pay thar wattir malis of the raik for this yer to mastir Jhon' gray mason
aftir the tenour of the assignacion maid' obefor

the samyn day the court wardit and it was gevin for dome that thome simson'
is avand' and sal pay to alexander sanchar iij barrel and demi of Salmond' and xx s' siluer

The saide day thomas simsone and alexander sanchar oblist tham be thar handis vphaldin
to stande at ordinance of the aldirman Robert blinsele and thomas fif anent al debatis
betuix tham

the samyn day the borghe strekit apone Willekin lichthernes be Will moire
is continevit quhil friday that next cumis

The quihilk day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Dauid menyeis yongar
forspekar that thome of mar bringe hayme certificacion in the erast schip saland'
out of the port of Abirdene to the wer' and cumand' again that the pip of wade followit
be thome quhit was richtuislie arrestit be ane obligacion of the said' thomas
quhitis And' this beinge done thai fande the borghe strekit be the said' thomas
quhit apone the said' thomas mar' of nayne avale And' falyeinge tharof thai
fande the said' borghe of vaile
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio octavo die februarij Anno quosupra

the samyn day the
borghe strekit apone Willekin be Will mor' anent a pip of dry gudis
was continevit be the assis' quhil to morne becaus' the matir was greit
to get mar' Certificacion tharintill

In the balye court haldin in the tolbutht the ix day of februar' the borghe strekit
apon' Willekin be Will moir' is continevit quhil monunday In hoip of concorde
